title: Status of preparedness of documentation for the Fifth Committee during the main part of the eightieth session of the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/C.5/80/L.1
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
26 September 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-15228 (E)    300925 
*2515228* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Fifth Committee 
 
 
 
 
 Status of preparedness of documentation for the Fifth 
Committee during the main part of the eightieth session of 
the General Assembly 
 
 
 
 Note by the Secretariat 
 
 
1. 
The attention of the members of the Fifth Committee is drawn to the note by the 
Secretariat (A/C.5/80/1) indicating the items allocated to the Committee for 
consideration during the eightieth session of the General Assembly. 
2. 
The annex to the present note indicates the status of preparedness of 
documentation for consideration by the Committee during the main part of the 
eightieth session. Where documents have not been issued to date, to the extent 
possible estimates of the dates for their issuance have been indicated. 
 
 

A/C.5/80/L.1 
 
25-15228
2/13
